message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

I understand you're looking to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm not comfortable going as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $110. It's a fair price considering the product's value.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $100?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $110, Bob. I'm willing to give you a small discount, though. I'll meet you at $105. It's a fair price considering the product's value.
I appreciate your willingness to give me a discount, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $98?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $105, Bob. I'm willing to give you a small concession, though. I'll meet you at $102. It's a fair price considering the product's value.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $102, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $99?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $102, Bob. I'm willing to give you a small concession, though. I'll meet you at $101. It's a fair price considering the product's value.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $101, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $100?
